name: X-Tract
description:
The story follows a high school girl who is a party goer and accidentally got pregnant. In an occasion she attended, she remembers the choices she made in her past and she must face consequences of her decisions and every actions. When she got home, a rather unexpected event happened, this time she is facing a hard choice. Not knowing what will happened to her and to the unborn baby, for every decision she make will affect the baby.  

“What should I do?”

She had never experience this kind of test. Will she be able to nurture the child inside her? Will she be able to face the challenges?

X-TRACT is a visual novel game and its game play has a low level of interactivity and consists of scenes with static two-dimensional images of characters in a first-person perspective. The game features a mostly linear story, with some alternative scenes and endings depending on the choices the player makes.

***X-Track is a school project, if we violated your rules by using your assets, feel free to contact us. Thank you for understanding***
